mapper.sql: WITH SCDU AS ( SELECT * FROM COM_CODE WHERE COM_CODE_GRP = 'SEC010' ) SELECT SCHAFS_BEGIN_DATE, SCHAFS_END_DATE, SCDU_SE, SEMSTR_SE, SC.COM_CODE_NM SCDU_SE_NM, SUBSTR(SEMSTR_SE,1,4)||'년도 '||SUBSTR(SEMSTR_SE,5,1)||'학기' SEMSTR_SE_NM, SC.COM_CODE COM1 FROM SCHOOL_AFFAIRS_SCHEDULE SAS INNER JOIN SCDU SC ON (SC.COM_CODE = SAS.SCDU_SE) ORDER BY SCHAFS_BEGIN_DATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SCHOOL_AFFAIRS_SCHEDULE ( SCDU_SE, SEMSTR_SE, SCHAFS_BEGIN_DATE, SCHAFS_END_DATE ) VALUES ( #{scduSe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{semstrSe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{schafsBeginDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{schafsEndDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: SELECT COM_CODE , COM_CODE_GRP , COM_CODE_NM , COM_CODE_DESC , USE_YN , COM_CODE_SEQ , UPPER_CODE_GRP , UPPER_COM_CODE FROM COM_CODE WHERE COM_CODE_GRP = #{comCodeGrp}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM SCHOOL_AFFAIRS_SCHEDULE WHERE SCDU_SE = #{scduSe} AND SEMSTR_SE = #{semstrSe}
